name: xlike Kernel Patchset
short_description: xlike Kernel Patchset is a patch collection for the Linux vanilla kernel. It includes code from a lot of projects, such as Kernel Mode Linux, Novell AppArmor, Ndiswrapper-1.34rc2, SquashFS, AFS, Openswan, CDemu, L7-filter and various accumulated bugfixes
